item.title: ::empty command please

^

Can any one please help, this is my command so far…

[quote] if (command[0].equals(“empty”)) {
player.removeAllItems;
player.sendMessage(“You empty your inventory”);
}[/quote]

Thanks.[/quote]
What source are you using?

item.title: ::empty command please

Alright i’ve been working on making a ::empty command, and i always get "error: not a statement player.removeAllitems;
^

Can any one please help, this is my command so far…

if (command[0].equals("empty")) { player.removeAllItems; player.sendMessage("You empty your inventory"); }

Thanks.
